Text.Language: Cmou e~nici] nem nicim: Mare peknai nem tekhir/n/ oi n~cobt m~peklaoc: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
Bless the seeds and the herbs: May Your mercy and peace be a fortress unto Your people: Save us and have mercy on us.
